resources.string: Too much vertical velocity. Your landing speed must be under 10 m/sec.
Nice crater! All that training really payed off.
You just dug a hole half way to Clavius.
Too much horizontal velocity. Your horizontal motion must be less than 1 m/sec.
Missed the landing site. You must land on flat terrain.
Lander Lost!\nYou are out of range of the command module and presumed lost.
